We can set the laycan for this option from June 5th to June 10th.\n\nAlternatively, we can offer the BERGE MAWSON, which has a DWT of 181160 and an LOA of 292m, also fitting the cargo size perfectly. The freight quote for this vessel would be slightly higher at USD 51 per metric ton, considering different operating costs.
